title: Coming to Astoria: An Immigrant's Tale
description: The third edition of Coming to Astoria is a collection of essays providing insight into growing up in a new land, an abusive home and some of the culture from the Middle East. Coming to Astoria takes the reader on a journey of self-discovery which is humorous, entertaining, and educational. This is a fascinating human interest story filled with poignant memories about growing up in a working class neighborhood in Astoria, New York.
author: Omar Kiam
